'''''Amon Hen'' 204''' is the two-hundred-and-fourth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[March]] [[2007]].

** By: ''[[Berúthiel|Beruthiel]]'s Pet''
